Articles.Content: Am I the only one who thinks we need a tweakable to invert control surfaces? Usually the game decides on its own which way a control surface should work, and most of the time it gets it right. But on the off chance it gets it wrong it would be great to be able to correct it without having to compromise your design.

Moved this suggestion over to Suggestions and Development Discussion.

I don't run into this issue a whole lot, though I know others do. Certainly more control over construction would be better. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You can invert it I think, but only for the whole control surface.
That invert option in the tweakable menu is for deploying them as flaps only, I don't think it affects deflection direction for attitude control.
